## Description

Backend codebase for [BabyDo](https://babydo.vercel.app) an app that helps you keep track of your babyâ€™s routine.
Built with [Nest](https://github.com/nestjs/nest) + Typescript

## Todo
- [ ] Add GraphQL

## Installation

```bash
$ yarn install
```

## Running the app

```bash
# development
$ yarn run start

# watch mode
$ yarn run start:dev

# production mode
$ yarn run start:prod
```

## Test

```bash
# unit tests
$ yarn run test

# e2e tests
$ yarn run test:e2e

# test coverage
$ yarn run test:cov
```
